cu.explanation_en: Setting local_s_portc to 70000 exceeds the valid port range (0-65535), causing socket binding failure and preventing F1 interface communication.

du.explanation_en: Setting local_n_address to null creates a missing value, causing interface binding failure and preventing proper F1 setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 local_n_address 設定為 null 會建立缺失值，導致介面綁定失敗，並阻止正確的 F1 設定。
